root.name: Breeze
root.description: Breeze is a game in which the player navigates a flower through a course riddled with obstacles. The player controls the flower by either tilting their phone in the intended direction, or by swiping with their finger from behind the flower. In order to get around the courses, the player must consider the momentum of the flower, as well as the obstacles lying around the corner. Some levels have the player collecting yellow orbs before being able to reach the finish line. Breeze is Free on Windows Phone 7 devices, and includes achievements.
